item.title: Drawing Closer to God
item.description:
Drawing Closer to God by Elder Terence M. Vinson, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 183rd Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2013
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Terence M. Vinson, Of the Seventy

item.title: True Disciples of the Savior
item.description:
True Disciples of the Savior by Elder Terence M. Vinson, Of the Presidency of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 189th Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2019
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
